channel.title: Branding on Masa Iwabuchi
channel.description: Recent content in Branding on Masa Iwabuchi

item.title: Daifuku
item.description: 2015, Corporate Website | Professional Work Design Question: How do we build awareness for a global unified brand? Clients thought their website was becoming obsolete and wanted to enhance their brand using current web technologies and user-centered disciplines. And Daifuku has 20 branches in the world, so they wanted to provide global integrated contents and operations. Service Ecosystem Design Based on a service design approach, we designed and proposed from a business organization to UX / UI and an infrastructure.
